text: It's Brit Awards time and while we might not be in the glory days of Geri's union jack tea towel dress and a Chumbawumba Tubthumping performance, there's one thing that always peaks our interest...the red carpet outfits. From Little Mix, to Maya Jama and Dua Lipa see what all your faves wore to sashay down that infamous red carpet right here.
title: Every red carpet outfit you need to see from the 2018 Brit Awards
